briefTitle: Indocyanine Green Fluorescence-guided Sentinel Node Biopsy in Breast Cancer Within a North African Population: a Retrospective Study
officialTitle: Indocyanine Green Fluorescence-guided Sentinel Node Biopsy in Breast Cancer Within a North African Population: a Retrospective Study
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* non-pregnant or lacting adult female patients with breast cancer without palpable clinical node and considered suitable for such procedure at multidisciplinary meeting were included

Exclusion Criteria:

* Non eligible patient for breast cancer sentinel node procedure
